rows.label: tev024391_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, fiddle-dee-dee! I can't remember the last time
anyone other than a salesman called on me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0002
rows.name: May I ask you something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0003
rows.name:
Lately I've had Nopon salesmen knocking on my door
one after the other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0004
rows.name:
They're always trying to sell me their handmade junk
at absurdly inflated prices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0005
rows.name:
Drums, wallets made of woven leaves, acorn abacuses,
that sort of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0006
rows.name:
They look so cute, and yet there's something so...sleazy
about them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0007
rows.name:
I worry that they're hunting for weak-minded
people who will buy whatever junk they're pushing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'd like to file a complaint before someone gets conned,
but I don't know who to talk to about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0009
rows.name:
I hear the Nopon elder is bad news in all sorts of
ways, so he's out. But who else is there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest Ngogo[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Wendy that she should talk
to your acquaintance, Ngogo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest Loma[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Wendy that she should talk
to your acquaintance, Loma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0010
rows.name: So he's the Nopon who looks after the elder?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, this Ngogo sounds very responsible!
...At least by Nopon standards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0012
rows.name: Very well. I shall go file a complaint with Ngogo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0013
rows.name:
At the very least, I hope that will stop the salesmen
from visiting me 20 to 30 times a day, trying every
possible strategy to sell me their junk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0014
rows.name: I swear, I have had it with them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0015
rows.name:
Hmmm... So this Loma patrols the streets cracking
down on evildoers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0016
rows.name: I had no idea the Nopon could be so righteous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0017
rows.name: Very well. I shall go file a complaint with Loma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0018
rows.name:
At the very least, I hope that will stop the salesmen
from visiting me 20 to 30 times a day, trying every
possible strategy to sell me their junk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024391_MSG0019
rows.name: I swear, I have had it with them![ST:wait ]
